data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of an intense winter monsoon and a broad band of clouds, it will be mainly cloudy and persistently cold over the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. The monsoon is expected to be replaced by a fresh to strong easterly airstream gradually during the weekend to early next week. Temperatures will rise progressively over the coast of southern China, but it will still be cool in the morning. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Nokaen will move across the seas east of the Philippines and dissipate gradually today and tomorrow.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260121","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore at first.","forecastWeather":"Becoming cold. Mainly cloudy.
